name: polynomial-evaluate
description: Got the idea for this project while studying some Discrete maths.was built on the foundation of Horner's algorithm. The algorithm is recursive as can be seen in case 3 of my switch statements  which enables mathematicians evaluate polynomials of n degree and as somebody with an Engineering background,I know how it feels having a tool like this particularly since it has to do with algebra.Mathematicians will find this useful.
